= Introduction =

ThunderDL - command line interface for Thunder Mini<br>
(Requires Thunder Mini and .Net Framework 4.5)<br>
- http://dl.xunlei.com/mini.html<br>
- http://www.microsoft.com/zh-cn/download/details.aspx?id=30653<br>

= Details =
Installation instructions:
 # Install Thunder Mini
 # Unzip `ThunderMini\ThunderDL.exe` into any folder
 # Run ThunderDL.exe from command prompt
 # Enjoy

ps. Thunder Mini window will briefly appear for each download added. Please ignore.<br>
ps2. If you get an error, try running: `regsvr32.exe "C:\Program Files (x86)\Thunder Network\MiniThunder\bho\ThunderAgent.dll"`<br>
